and p.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')

select * from `supervision_time_type`

SELECT a.project_id,a.id abarbeitung_id,p.name project_name,a.location,a.create_at,a.state abarbeitung_state FROM `abarbeitung` a INNER JOIN `project` p ON a.project_id=p.id where 1=1
and p.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and a.state < 3
and a.state=3 and a.create_by=#{create_by}
order by a.create_at desc

select count(*) FROM `abarbeitung` a INNER JOIN `project` p ON a.project_id=p.id where 1=1
and p.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and a.state < 3
and a.state=3 and a.create_by=#{create_by}
order by a.create_at desc

SELECT a.project_id,p.name project_name,a.id abarbeitung_id,a.construction_organization,a.location,a.time,a.state abarbeitung_state,a.description,a.site_photo,a.harm,a.punishment,a.sign,a.else,u.user_name create_by,a.create_at FROM `abarbeitung` a LEFT JOIN `user` u ON a.create_by=u.id INNER JOIN `project` p ON a.project_id=p.id where a.id=#{abarbeitung_id}

SELECT c.id item_id,c.project_id,p.name project_name,t.name type_name,c.item_data,c.state item_state FROM (SELECT * FROM `construction_item` ORDER BY id DESC ) c LEFT JOIN `project` p ON c.project_id=p.id LEFT JOIN `construction_item_type` t ON c.type_id=t.id WHERE 1=1
and p.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and c.state=2
and c.state=1 and c.create_by=#{create_by}
GROUP BY p.id order by c.create_at desc

SELECT c.id,c.project_id,c.type_id,c.credential_id,t.remind,t.name type_name,cc.name credential_name,c.item_data,c.photo,c.ossa,c.charge,c.request, c.construction_before,c.special_deal,c.construction_after,c.else,u.user_name create_by,c.create_at FROM `construction_item` c INNER JOIN `construction_item_type` t ON c.type_id=t.id INNER JOIN `construction_item_credential` cc ON c.credential_id=cc.id INNER JOIN `user` u ON c.create_by=u.id where c.id=#{item_id}

SELECT c.id,c.project_id,p.name project_name,c.construction_organization,c.type_id,t.name type_name,t.remind,c.is_read,c.credential_id,cc.name credential_name,c.item_data,c.photo,c.ossa,c.charge,c.request, c.construction_before,c.special_deal,c.construction_after,c.else,u.user_name create_by,c.create_at,c.is_read FROM `construction_item` c INNER JOIN `project` p ON c.project_id=p.id INNER JOIN `construction_item_type` t ON c.type_id=t.id INNER JOIN `construction_item_credential` cc ON c.credential_id=cc.id INNER JOIN `user` u ON c.create_by=u.id where c.id=#{item_id}

select count(*) FROM `construction_item` c INNER JOIN `project` p ON c.project_id=p.id INNER JOIN `construction_item_type` t ON c.type_id=t.id where 1=1
and p.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and c.state=2
and c.state=1 and c.create_by=#{create_by}
order by c.create_at desc

SELECT p.id project_id,s.id schedule_id,p.name project_name,'计划进度' AS type_name,s.state schedule_state FROM (SELECT * FROM `project_schedule` ORDER BY id DESC ) s LEFT JOIN `project` p ON s.project_id=p.id WHERE 1=1
and p.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and s.state=2
and s.state=1 and s.create_by=#{create_by}
GROUP BY p.id order by s.create_at desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT p.id project_id,s.id schedule_id,p.name project_name,'计划进度' AS type_name,s.state schedule_state FROM `project_schedule` s INNER JOIN `project` p ON s.project_id=p.id WHERE 1=1
and p.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and s.state=2
and s.state=1 and s.create_by=#{create_by}
GROUP BY p.id) sp

SELECT s.id schedule_id,s.meeting_data,s.meeting_summary,s.site_photo,s.schedule,s.else,s.create_at,u.user_name create_by FROM `project_schedule` s LEFT JOIN `user` u ON s.create_by=u.id WHERE s.state=2 and s.project_id=#{project_id} order by s.create_at desc limit 1
SELECT s.id FROM `project_schedule` s where s.state=2 and s.project_id=#{project_id} order by s.create_at limit 1

SELECT s.id schedule_id,s.project_id,p.name project_name,s.construction_organization,s.supervising_organization,s.meeting_data,s.meeting_summary,s.site_photo,s.schedule,s.else,s.create_at,u.user_name create_by FROM `project_schedule` s INNER JOIN project p ON s.project_id=p.id inner join `user` u on s.create_by=u.id WHERE s.id=#{schedule_id}

select p.id project_id,p.name `name`,location,construction_org,supervising_org,PM,p.state project_state,s.state_name,t.id type_id,t.name type_name from project p inner join project_state s on p.state=s.state_id inner join project_type t on p.project_type=t.id where 1=1
and p.state BETWEEN 4 AND 6
and p.state BETWEEN 3 AND 6
order by p.create_at desc

SELECT s.id supervision_id,s.begin_time,s.project_id,s.supervision_model_id,p.name project_name,t.name type_name,p.location,p.construction_org,p.supervising_org,st.type,st.count,m.model_name,md.department_id,d.dname FROM `supervision` s LEFT JOIN `supervision_time_type` st ON s.supervision_time_id=st.id LEFT JOIN `project` p ON s.project_id=p.id LEFT JOIN project_type t ON p.project_type=t.id LEFT JOIN `supervision_model` m ON s.supervision_model_id=m.id LEFT JOIN `supervision_model_department` md on s.supervision_model_id=md.model_id LEFT JOIN `department` d on md.department_id=d.id where 1=1
and s.id =#{supervision_id}

SELECT s.id,p.name project_name,t.name type_name,p.location,p.construction_org,p.supervising_org,st.count time_count,st.type time_type,s.begin_time,s.total_count,m.model_name,smd.department_id FROM `supervision` s INNER JOIN `supervision_model` m ON s.supervision_model_id=m.id INNER JOIN project p ON s.project_id=p.id INNER JOIN `project_type` t ON p.project_type=t.id INNER JOIN `supervision_time_type` st ON s.supervision_time_id=st.id INNER JOIN `supervision_model_department` smd ON m.id=smd.model_id where p.state BETWEEN 4 AND 6
and p.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and t.id =#{type_id}
and p.construction_org like CONCAT('%',#{construction_org},'%')
order by s.create_at desc

SELECT a.id,p.name,t.name type_name,p.id project_id,p.construction_org,p.supervising_org,a.location,a.description,a.state,u.user_name create_by,a.create_at FROM `abarbeitung` a INNER JOIN project p ON a.project_id=p.id INNER JOIN `project_type` t ON p.project_type=t.id INNER JOIN `user` u ON a.create_by=u.id WHERE p.state BETWEEN 3 AND 6
and t.id =#{type_id}
and p.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and p.construction_org like CONCAT('%',#{construction_org},'%')
and a.state!=3
and a.state=3 and a.create_by=#{create_by}
order by a.create_at desc

SELECT p.id project_id,p.name project_name,p.location,p.construction_org,p.supervising_org,t.name type_name,s.id schedule_id,s.schedule,s.meeting_data,s.state schedule_state,u.user_name create_by,s.create_at FROM (SELECT * FROM `project_schedule` ORDER BY id DESC ) s INNER JOIN `project` p ON s.project_id=p.id INNER JOIN `user` u ON s.create_by=u.id INNER JOIN `project_type` t on p.project_type=t.id WHERE 1=1
and p.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and p.project_type=#{type_id}
and p.construction_org like CONCAT('%',#{construction_org},'%')
and s.state=2
and s.state=1 and s.create_by=#{create_by}
GROUP BY p.id order by s.create_at desc
